Text:
This is NOT the "Extended Cut".  This film is 100 minutes long, the "Extended Cut" is 108 minutes long.

The quality of the video is mediocre at best.  It looks like the picture is all scrunched up and appears very tall and long.  Audio is okay.


I really appreciate all the uploads, but in the future it would be nice if you could make sure the upload is what you say it is.  Again, this is NOT the Extended version of the film.

In case anyone wants a much better (by very much) version of the actual UNRATED cut of the film, try raymondhome's version at: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5179092/The.Hangover.2009.UNRATED.BDRip.XviD-BeStDivX
